long_description: The Hugger Mugger Yoga ball can be used for yoga, Pilates, dance and a daily workout routine. Ball helps to improve balance, strength and stability. Made from durable vinyl, the ball can support up to 600 lbs. Ball is shipped uninflated and includes a small handheld pump. 65cm (26 in.) size is recommended for individuals ranging in height from 5 ft. 7 in. - 5 ft. 11 in.
short_description: The Hugger Mugger Yoga ball can be used for yoga, Pilates, dance and a daily workout routine.
